2.description: Joker can try a second time if negotiations with an upbeat shadow are unsuccessful

entries.question: Plus, maybe then I'll be able to help out a little more.
If my time dropped even a little, he'd cuss me out. Then on top of that...
Ugh... I should've kept up my running.

3.description: If Joker's attack fails to down an enemy, Ryuji may follow up with a second attack to try again to down said enemy

entries.question: That don't got anything to do with this...
I get pissed off so damn easily. I really gotta work on that.

4.description: The group is less likely to be spotted while Dashing in the Metaverse

entries.question: But for some reason it don't look like he's gettin' along...
It's good they're keepin' their heads low now though...
Oh yeah! You bring your stuff?
... Good for them.
But I'm still worried 'bout their advisor, Yamauchi...
But I mean, if anything happens, I know you got my back...

6.description: Ryuji may cure the party's status ailments

entries.question: You got any ideas?
entries.answer: We can train at my place.

entries.question: Huh? That's a load of bull!
You get what I'm tryin' to say, yeah?
It's like how I feel when I'm talkin' to you, man.
Uhhh, I don't know how else to explain. I just feel...free.
And Nakaoka can get weirdly stubborn sometimes...

7.description: You now have the chance to instantly defeat any shadow weaker than yourself without even having to fight them by dashing into them

entries.question: If we don't do something quick, Yamauchi's gonna...
I know that ain't the coolest thing to say, but it's how I feel.
Besides... I doubt those guys are gonna listen to anything I say...

8.description: Ryuji may now survive an otherwise-fatal attack with 1HP remaining

entries.question: So, I called Nakaoka and Takeishi over here...
You saw that, right? That was some serious violence!
entries.answer: Things turned out for the best.

entries.question: ... Thanks.
It's kinda like I was doin' a sprint... and you were runnin' next to me.
Seein' them havin' a real heart-to-heart talk... They got a good team.

9.description: Ryuji may jump in and take an otherwise-fatal attack for Joker

entries.question: Looks like they're finally walkin' their own path.
Oh, and uh... they asked me to come back to the team.
Wherever you decide to be, that's where you belong.
... I'm just glad I found it.
They're apparently keepin' Yamauchi as their advisor for now...

2.description: Ann can step in and help if negotiations with a female shadow go poorly

entries.question: So, I apologized as well.
... But in the end, maybe I just didn't believe in her ability.
... Thanks.
I can't just let things stay the way they are.
I hope you'll join me again next time!

3.description: If Joker's attack doesn't down the enemy, Ann might follow Joker's turn up with a second attack

entries.question: Well, I came up with a way to do it!
So basically, I want you to say stuff to me, and I'll try not to get fazed by it!
C'mon, hit me with your best shot!
Yeah, yeah, yeah! And?
Uh-huh, uh-huh. What else?
Bring it on!
You know... I kinda feel like this won't make our Personas stronger.
It sounds like shoots have been real hectic...
... Maybe less these days.
She had to have seen me, right? Do you think she thought I was cool...?

4.description: Steals the attention of an enemy and has the chance to cancel their upcoming action

entries.question: It has everything... but it feels like I can't understand any of it.
But that was when Shiho talked to me. The first thing she said was...
About that female thief in the anime I used to watch?...
And that's why I'm going to try and learn from them!
I'm gonna star in action movies!
Do you do anything to train your body?
entries.answer: I carry Morgana in my bag.

5.description: Shadows might ask for less during their negotiations

entries.question: Do you think maybe Shiho would want one too?
I really screwed that up...
But still, wasn't Mika's fake crying pretty incredible?
I-I dunno though, I think I'm pretty good at fake crying myself.
The key is... you don't actually cry!

6.description: Ann might cure a status ailment inflicted on a fellow party member

entries.question: I guess you really just need someone to laugh at you if you want to feel better.
So I agreed without thinking much of it...
... Is it because I'm weak?
So I was thinking, and um... what can I do to help Shiho?
But now that I saw her crying, I know I'll find something I can do for her...!

7.description: Chance to seduce the enemy during negotiation and steer discussion.

entries.question: I wonder why...
Why did Mika ask for me...?
I want to be a real model...!
Obviously that means dieting, cutting back on food, and no matter how tough it is, I'll do any workout!

8.description: Ann might survive an otherwise fatal attack with 1HP remaining

entries.question: Obviously I want to cut down on my waist size too...
Huh... There has to be somewhere my vibrant charm will shine, right!?
entries.answer: There's no doubt in my mind.

entries.question: It's simple stuff like that that'll help you keep pushin'.
I need to show her that I'm working hard...
entries.answer: She'll be happy to hear that.

entries.question: ...I wonder if this is how Shiho felt with her rehab? Being able to push herself because someone was there with her...

9.description: Ann might protect Joker from an otherwise fatal attack

entries.question: We're so high up...
So, I wanted to see if she would show up again now.
Because, well... the only way I can help Shiho is to show her how hard I'm working.
I guess... I'm alone again, huh...?

2.description: Allows Yusuke to use Blank Cards to duplicate Skill Cards

entries.question: I would like your honest opinion... if you would.
More importantly, it shall be the spark that revitalizes my slumberi...
I'm on a roll right now. I shall keep up this momentum and apply it ...

3.description: Gives Yusuke the chance to attack an enemy after Joker as a follow-up

entries.question: My work is... empty?
This grave mistake shall be the end for me...!
What is going to happen to me now...? Without art, what will remain ...
But that is all the more reason I must break out of my slump. I mus...
I'm going to have ten pieces finished up by end of today!

entries.question: Thank you for your assistance today. After all, it would be impossi...
It seems my bias has caused me to overlook the truth of the matter...
Even if I ever do understand it, will I truly be able to draw it...?

5.description: Grants Yusuke the ability to create any Skill card he has copied before.

entries.question: You will have to be my model today.
entries.answer: Do you want me to strip?

entries.question: Do you think I will be able to capture the truth someday?
The further I seem to be from understanding the abyss of the heart.

6.description: Gives Yusuke the chance to step in and heal status ailments on party members

entries.question: This place has not changed in the slightest...
Why do you think Madarame decided to take me in?
What's your impression of him?

7.description: Grants Yusuke the ability to use Card Duplication and Card Creation on the spot.

entries.question: We'll sell you as the 'tragic, handsome artist.
Why is it that all artists talk about is money, money, money!?...
I'm a petty sellout, a slave to the power of money!
entries.answer: It's not a crime to enjoy sushi

8.description: Gives Yusuke a chance to withstand a blow in combat that would usually kill

entries.question: What subject do you think would most capture beauty?
Is this what pure passion is supposed to look like!?...

9.description: Gives Yusuke the ability to shield Joker from an attack that would be fatal

entries.question: When my mother was painting the 'Sayuri'...
But that is why I am going to wield my brush again... To give hope ...
I heard there were quite a few brothels as well.
If you hadn't been there to rescue me, I...
I guess nothing beats practical experience.

entries.question: What's up with that, Miss Prez?

entries.answer: Sounds like you two get along.

I had completely forgotten about that dream, to be honest...

What should we do…?
entries.answer: Try to reach out to her.

entries.question: Are you seriously datin'?

entries.answer: Tell him you're on a date.

entries.question: I'm not sure any of that would have happened if not for the incident...
Trying to bring justice and order to the world around him.
And more importantly, how do I want to live...?
Wanna hav a double wedding?
Can we keep this up until I can make a call one way or the other?
entries.answer: It's the role I always hoped for.

entries.question: So he calls you his special princess... What do you think, Joker?
She needs to realize that. You're going to help, right?

9.description: Gives Makoto the ability to shield Joker from an attack that would be fatal

entries.question: I dare you!
People noticed what happened...
entries.answer: We should get out of here.

entries.question: I can't believe I actually hit one of my friends..
How did you ever find somewhere like this...? You know so much.
I can't learn about romance by myself...
Do you... like me?
I'd do anything for you.

entries.answer: I was about to come find you.

entries.question: She started saying it every day from then on.
entries.answer: That must have been a shock.

entries.question: I felt terrible, but she just kept yelling at me for reading it...
I get so scared...

entries.question: They're even selling the pictures now...

Long story short... we made up! I finally apologized to her.
It's all because of you that I could do it!
I'm so glad I cleared that goal.

entries.answer: Now this is my kind of club.

entries.question: Well then, why don't we get some drinks?
How relaxing. I really do like coming here.
That reminds me, do you cook?

What a realistic game.

entries.question: I wish I'd played better.

entries.question: Ahh, this feels wonderful... It's been a while.
Whenever she had to bring a man home, she'd send me off...
I know the hot water can make people dizzy...
I think I feel a little lightheaded.
I wonder why I told you? Curious indeed.
We're both victims of the adults who unfairly impacted our lives.
If they saw how I was acting today...
You have to be indirect, but precise, to land it in the pocket...
I'm impressed that you beat me. You've become quite skilled.
...the teammates you have now. How about it?
Phone Call

entries.question: If we had fought to the end, do you see yourself winning?
You're the one person I refuse to lose to.
Should the opponent accept the glove, the duel is also accepted.
You don't seem to be sick... Are you up to something illegal!?
I'm so over this.
You know how it is. Some patients get sick on their way back home.

entries.question: Participating in clinical trials run by a doctor like that?
You… haven't told anyone about my drugs, right?
Hehe.

entries.question: That's why it's harmless for people who don't have the disease...

I'll need you to stick around just a little bit longer.

entries.question: I can...
Ugh. I wish I hadn't shown you that side of me...
I'm all out of allies...
So she's... she's alive...
Sorry. Just hang in there, OK?
Miwa-chan was fighting all that time. I have to fight for her, too.
All this is thanks to you helping me with the clinical trials.
Why don't you tell me the truth about why you kept coming to me?
...Don't tell me you're in love with me or something.
Or... I can give you a "special examination" if you'd like.
Turns out my little guinea pig caught an illness that's even more ...

2.description: Allows you to brew coffee that restores SP to one ally

entries.question: You know what I'm talking about, right?
Ugh... I don't know where he caught wind of this place.
Besides, ladies love a guy who knows his coffee.
entries.answer: I want the ladies to love me.

entries.question: Seems like you’re a quick study, so I hope you've got the hang of it.
...Are you listening to me? What grind are you supposed to use?
Sorry, something just came up. We can keep going with the lessons...
But don't worry, I'll put you to work.

4.description: Allows you to cook curry that restores SP to all allies

entries.question: That's because the acidity and the bean flavor profile all depend...
It looks like Sojiro's in trouble. What should I do...?
Just let him do his thing, and get on with the job. Got it?
And what about you?
I thought my pick-up lines were the best in town...
That's why when I took her in, I vowed to keep this recipe alive...
entries.answer: It really paid off in the end.

entries.question: It's only a problem when she asks for it three times a day.

6.description: Allows you to brew coffee that restores a large amount of SP

entries.question: By the way, what are your thoughts on So-chan's life of solitude?
Doesn't quite seem to be the best environment for Futaba, now does it?
I don't even know how he managed to find me here...
Futaba's fast asleep... Didn't mean to get you tangled up...
At the end of the day, the coffee and the curry people love...
And that's only because you helped us connect, so... thanks for that.
entries.answer: Feel like a real dad now?

entries.question: How about you? Anything you'd wanna add to the menu?
What a pain in the ass. Don't you have enough problems already?

9.description: Allows you to cook curry that restores a large amount of SP

entries.question: How is it... living with Sakura-san? Please, you can speak honestly.
...Sojiro?
Getting all sentimental like this? At my age?
Sounds like there's some weird stuff goin' down.

3.description: Allows you to perform medium-level customizations on your firearms

entries.question: The same clan I was in... back when I was part of the yakuza.
entries.answer: I always knew you were a thug.

entries.question: ..Hope I ain't scarin' you off with all this talk.
entries.answer: We made a deal, didn't we?

entries.question: I'm gonna be able to give Tsuda a real scare thanks to the info...
Now Tsuda knows your face. And that could be a real problem.

5.description: Reduces the cost of gun customization

entries.question: He's just got too much power...
...You prolly don't want anythin' to do with me after that, huh?
entries.answer: I'll stick around for the guns.

entries.question: But I gotta protect that secret, no matter what. For Kaoru's sake.
What've you been talkin' about?
Ain't that right?
Glad to see you two get along.

7.description: Allows you to perform high-level customizations on your firearms

entries.question: Don't somethin' about that seem off to you?
And now he's tryin' to use me to cover up his mistake.
We can't afford to take any chances.
I hope dealing with all this yakuza business hasn't been too much...
entries.answer: I did it all for Iwai.

entries.question: Just forget all of this...
You think a guy can really go through a drastic change that quick?
I understand kids these days have all sortsa commitments...
Seemed like he was on the level, but... can't be too careful.
Serves him right, huh?
Kaoru...
Guess you're maturin' quicker than I even realized...
...The kid must've grown into a man while I wasn't looking.

2.description: Allows you to perform various activities during Kawakami's class

entries.question: Doesn't it pain your heart to see such a cute maid all dirty?
You weren't expecting to do anything weird with me, were you?
Is that okay, Master?

3.description: Allows you to request Kawakami to make coffee or do laundry

entries.question: The high-end cup noodles really do make a difference, don't they?
I heard they might even cut the teachers' salaries... I'm so sick...
You're still young, so you really need to eat properly...
But he said that he prioritizes 'younger' women!
I look pretty good as a maid, don't I?

5.description: Gives you free time in other teachers' classes

entries.question: You know you're being used for money... and you still request me?
He threatened me... saying that I'd be dismissed if I continued...
Do you get to eat that place's curry every day?
Sorry... I need to take a break...
I can't stop coughing...
If you neglect stuff like that, it makes you more likely to get sick.

7.description: Allows Kawakami to make curry or infiltration tools for you

entries.question: I should be able to send it out tomorrow...
I guess transferring to our sister company is the only way...
This is just what I have to do.
entries.answer: Is this what you really want?

entries.question: What do you think?
And that is my answer! ...Well, what do you think?
As your teacher, I will never betray you.
It's thanks to you that I actually figured out what I need to do.
I bet I'll be an old woman by the time I achieve my dreams.
Today marks the day I graduate from being your maid.
Besides, won't you be lonely? Hm?
entries.answer: I want to keep seeing you.

entries.question: Giving someone the wrong idea... It's a sinful act, you know?
This situation isn't normal. I'm a teacher, and you're my student...
entries.answer: I'm a man, you're a woman.

entries.question: We need the Phantom Thieves to be seen in the proper light...
It's like I'll be your strategic image management representative...
At this point, I might as well pull an all-nighter fighting back!
All thieves are supposed to have some special ladies, right?
Don't spill the beans, okay?
I didn't have time to really vet them too much.
It's always better to hear that kinda stuff in person, right?
...don't be afraid to go all out! What do you wanna eat?
Not bad for strategic management, huh?
I guess it ended up being pretty good for our PR in the end, right?

5.description: Increases EXP earned by backup party members

entries.question: It cost me a lot of money...
Some of the stuff up there is pretty scary...
I'm gonna do everything in my power, so you can just kick back!
This one's massive!
I hear a rumor that a famous idol fell into his clutches...
After all, I'm the only reason you guys have gotten this far, right?

entries.question: I need to make sure our next target is one we can win against.
So... we're gonna purge them.
I wonder if there's really any way a pathetic guy like me can help...
It seems like enough evidence to make him a target...
Akira... run.
Urgh...
My whole act would've broken down if they didn't back off...
B-But I have the model gun I got for self-defense!

Um, well, I'm doing a photoshoot for one...

Really, I would be delighted to do this again.

entries.question: I apologize. That must have been quite a shock.
But it's honestly quite difficult for me.

entries.answer: You've got a lot to deal with.

entries.question: So now she's even more insistent on having me do more TV...
Maybe I should stop playing shogi and just get a job...
Considering how good a listener you are, I mean.

entries.question: ..I confess I am a bit scared, though.
entries.answer: It may all come down to luck.

entries.question: I have to show them what I'm made of!
That way, I can use the weekly magazine's popularity against them...

...So this is goodbye.
entries.answer: I want to stay by your side.

entries.question: I've been wanting to come here for a while...
You look so cool! What do you think?
Would you mind poking around with me for a bit longer?
It just seems perfect for my dad somehow.
I wasn't even me anymore.
He was so happy with them!

I did it, Senpai! I hit the ball!
I'd forgotten how it felt to work that hard on someone else's behalf
Was there anything else you wanted to try, Senpai?

6.description: Kasumi may step in to rescue a failed demon negotiation

entries.question: This is the real me, I guess.

7.description: Chance to cure status ailments on party members

entries.question: Siiigh...
I'm just worthless after all…
Senpai, will you go out with me again?
You might be just as tough as Kasumi... Amazing.

8.description: Chance to withstand a fatal blow with 1 HP remaining

entries.question: Well, I guess it's important to have a balanced diet...?
I don't even know if I'm worth showing off...
Um, what do you think?
I don't think that'd change how I feel about it.
B-By the way, where do you like to get your clothes from, Senpai?
I hope it's not too much trouble.
I’d like you to be there when I do... Is that okay?
I talked about wanting you to see me...
I hope I still helped Kasumi somehow...
There's something I need to tell you, Senpai!
The last thing I want to do is make you uncomfortable...

2.description: Chance to cure status ailments on Joker immediately

entries.question: Welcome! Thank you for coming.
Maybe that's a little weird for you to hear from a guy...
You can have them! They're yours!

3.description: Chance to receive Charge and Concentrate at the start of battle

entries.question: I'm glad the ones who came to me have taken some steps...
You remember how I asked you to help me with my research?
Do you have any thoughts on this kind of pain?
You helped me realize that purpose again. Thank you.
I thought I'd thank you once again for your help earlier.
I had no idea a cat's claws were so sharp...
...like putting antibiotics on a scratch.
We'll even be able to perform more effective treatment for those...
I'm on a shoestring budget, so I wouldn't be able to pay you!
Is your schoolwork being affected?

5.description: Chance to restore Joker's SP when it is low

entries.question: Go ahead, enjoy!
You can see this law in action just by observing...
Your unconscious desires may have changed the taste of the cookie?
It would have been a subjective truth of your reality.
It ended up being another big academic discussion...
This is fantastic.
I'd appreciate if you'd help me talk through this again.
I don't think that would be enough to finally beat trauma.
Sorry for... hah... rushing out... so suddenly... earlier...

7.description: Increases the success rate of Flow

entries.question: I guess I've taken an academic interest in them.
How is such a feat even possible? Any ideas, Joker?
Does that remind you of anything?
You think I'm getting anywhere here?
I know it's been a while since you've had one, too!
I'd like to take you to that buffet, as my way of thanking you.
No holding back! Eat as much as you please!
Oh, he's uhhh... how do I put it?
My paper is finally almost finished.
Don't you wanna congratulate him too?
Maybe it's because he knows I'm a little careless, though.

9.description: Increases the success rate of Detox X

entries.question: I think this’ll probably be the last time I come to you...

2.description: Lowers Palace security level increases and starting level

entries.question: ...You have any photos or videos of it?
Why are you coming to a bar if you can't even drink alcohol?
I have a theory that they're all minors...
That's why I can't quit... and why I'll never give up.

4.description: Further lowers Palace security level increases

entries.question: We're totally dating, aren't we, sweetie?
I'll write you a solid article on the Phantom Thieves.
I'm going to prove Kayo's innocence though.
For me digging up your records and such without asking...
Ugh, my chief's such a shithead...
Maybe Kayo really was the culprit.
Dammit, that incident is all my fault...
I'm only able to meet my insane quota because of the info...
entries.answer: I'll dig up some more for you.

7.description: Palace security level starts at a much lower level

entries.question: What should I do? Should I go knock him out?!
I wish I was better at controlling my emotions. Like you are.
I'll do whatever it takes to find her...!
Say something.
Not just about Kayo's current state... but about what happened...
From now on, I'm always gonna chase the truth.
I'd get crushed if I tried to take them on without being prepared
entries.answer: You're not giving up, are you?

entries.question: I'm sure I'll get targeted... you shouldn't come here again.
That couple act...
Choice 6 (After Romance choice)
Phone Call
